tldr: Affected versions of this package may inadvertently expose sensitive information, as the `access_token` value can be included in error responses. This disclosure could allow attackers to obtain authentication credentials and gain unauthorized access.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `zapier-platform-core` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
